WhileStatement Class Reference

Loop statement whose body is repeatedly executed while a specified condition, tested before each execution, is true. More...

Detailed Description

Loop statement whose body is repeatedly executed while a specified condition, tested before each execution, is true.

C++

  • example: 
    while(x < 10)   // this->condition = "x < 10"
{
    // this->body
}
